pkgmetadata.longdescription: Discrete Transmuted Generalized Inverse Weibull Distribution // The Discrete Transmuted Generalized Inverse Weibull (DTGIW) distribution is a new distribution for count data analysis. The DTGIW is discrete distribution based on Atchanut and Sirinapa (2021). DOI: 10.14456/sjst-psu.2021.149.
